description: The post-Brexit trade deal will not be faultless but both sides are now hoping to sell it at home.
title: Brexit: Selling it as a big win on both sides of the Channel
title_page: Brexit: Selling it as a big win on both sides of the Channel - BBC News
maintext: A far cry from the "friction-free" trade deal once promised by former Prime Minister Theresa May, this is the "hardest" of Brexits - not the costly chaos of no deal at all - but nonetheless it means out of the EU's customs union and single market. There will be considerable non-tariff barriers from 2021.
